/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sun is shining brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. 

On either side of the road, trees stand tall, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene.

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. Despite the busyness of the scene, there's a sense of order and rhythm to the city's layout. It's a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist.
